channel.title: Changing characters rights
channel.description:
ok, so on my server i want to make myself a admin (who doesnt!) so i go onto my server file and click characters and then there is my player, i then open as notpad and go change my rights to 3 from 0.i then run the compile.bat and all goes fine and then i come out of that and click on runserver (also goes fine with this.) then i opened moparscape 3.0 and tried to log on and it said error connecting to server? i then went back to change my characters rights to 0 again and did everything the same and it worked! how come i cant change my characters rights without it working?? i do not understand?
i have also found that if i log onto moparscape 3.0 and then log off again and close the moparscape box and open it again and try and log on again it does not work... :|[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 02:20:23 PM[/size][hr]help plz? :(

item.title: Changing characters rights
item.dc:creator: @1_dum_taco 1 dum taco
item.description:
@1_dum_taco wrote:

^^ not guna work bro. you cant edit things from your charector file and make it chnage

to make yourself admin go into client.java and search for start of mod
it should come up with a list of names. change the names to the admin and compile and run it

Read full topic

An easier way, is going to the characters folder and open the .txt file with ur character name and changing your player rights from 0 to 3 As shown in this

item.title: Changing characters rights
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Go in your client.
Hold ctrl and f.
Search for.

3 = Admin

The top one, where the name is Admin.
Change the name to your playername.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing characters rights
item.dc:creator: @danny1corder danny1corder
item.description:
@danny1corder wrote:

0 = normal (no crown)
1 = p mod (silver crown)
2 = admin (gold crown)
3 = owner (gold crown)

Read full topic
